item.title: The Shunde Marriott Hotel has officially opened its doors in Foshan, China
item.description:
Marriott International has expanded its presence in China with the opening of the 258-room Shunde Marriott Hotel. Located in Shunde, a district of Foshan in Guangdong Province, the hotel is owned by Shunde Midea Group and managed by Marriott under a long-term agreement. This latest addition brings the Marriott Hotels brand’s portfolio in Greater China to 19 properties. Source: Marriott. The Shunde Marriott offers guests views of either Shunfeng Mountain Park or the city skyline...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-shunde-marriott-hotel-has-officially-opened-its-doors-in-foshan-china/

item.title: Indulge in a luxurious 20 Carat Gold Escape with JW Marriott Phu Quoc Emerald Bay and Maserati
item.description:
Source: JW Marriott Phu Quoc Emerald Bay. The lobby lounge. Upon arrival at the sports university-themed JW Marriott Phu Quoc Emerald Bay, guests will be greeted with a luxurious Maserati transfer*. Building on the success of the resort’s previous collaboration showcasing DMC’s SS2017 womenswear collection, this partnership with Maserati aims to captivate those passionate about sports and automobiles. Ty Collins, General Manager at JW Marriott Phu Quoc Emerald Bay, states, “This collaboration amplifies the resort’s commitment to offering design-focused experiences...
